parameters.name: DIJobId
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use the Id parameter instead.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the synchronization task.

parameters.name: JobSettings
parameters.description: The task-level settings, including DDL handling policies, column data type mapping between source and destination, and runtime parameters.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description: The DataWorks workspace ID. You can call the [ListProjects](~~178393~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: TableMappings
parameters.description:
The list of synchronization object transformation mappings. Each element describes a set of source object selection rules and the transformation rules applied to those objects.

>  \[ { "SourceObjectSelectionRules":\[ { "ObjectType":"Database", "Action":"Include", "ExpressionType":"Exact", "Expression":"biz_db" }, { "ObjectType":"Schema", "Action":"Include", "ExpressionType":"Exact", "Expression":"s1" }, { "ObjectType":"Table", "Action":"Include", "ExpressionType":"Exact", "Expression":"table1" } ], "TransformationRuleNames":\[ { "RuleName":"my_database_rename_rule", "RuleActionType":"Rename", "RuleTargetType":"Schema" } ] } ]

parameters.name: TransformationRules
parameters.description:
The list of synchronization object transformation rule definitions.

>  \[ { "RuleName":"my_database_rename_rule", "RuleActionType":"Rename", "RuleTargetType":"Schema", "RuleExpression":"{"expression":"${srcDatasoureName}\_${srcDatabaseName}"}" } ]
